name: Softnauts - Space Endless Runner
description:
The Sun might explode any moment and human civilization will cease to exist. Governments are sending rockets from Earth to collect all of the memory chips with informations that will help Humans find their way to the New Earth.

Kadett, use your agility, speed and endurance to save our species. Your rocket takes off in 50 seconds. Hurry up and may the force be with you!

Space Endless Runner. Asteroids. Classic Arcade Game. Feel like Han Solo flying Millennium Falcon through asteroid field in Star Wars Empire Strikes Back.
